meanings.definition: A smaller community within a larger community.
meanings.sent1: The subcommunity of artists in our town organizes art shows regularly.
meanings.sent2: The school's subcommunity of chess players meets every Friday after classes.
meanings.sent3: The subcommunity of dog lovers in the neighborhood always has the most wagging tails at the park.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the subcommunity of street performers adds a colorful touch to the sidewalks.
meanings.sent5: The subcommunity of book club members gathers at the library every month to discuss their latest reads.

meanings.definition: A group of people within a larger community who share common interests or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The subcommunity of hikers often explores the nearby trails together.
meanings.sent2: Within the school, the subcommunity of science enthusiasts eagerly participates in experiments.
meanings.sent3: The subcommunity of bakers in the town always has the best-smelling street during the holidays.
meanings.sent4: In the online gaming world, the subcommunity of speedrunners races against the clock for new records.
meanings.sent5: The subcommunity of bird watchers gathers at the park with their binoculars and guidebooks.
